member.name: FILE_ZERO_DATA_INFORMATION
member.summary: Contains a range of a file to set to zeros. This structure is used by theFSCTL_SET_ZERO_DATA control code

member.name: FILE_ZERO_DATA_INFORMATION.FileOffset
member.summary: The file offset of the start of the range to set to zeros, in bytes.

member.name: FILE_ZERO_DATA_INFORMATION.BeyondFinalZero
member.summary: The byte offset of the first byte beyond the last zeroed byte.
